Name: More and More
About the game: This game tells the story of a very strange city. The protagonist of this story will be Freek, a human being who found himself in the city of More. In this city there are citizens, who say that Freek is the chosen one, he will have to discover the truth to fulfill the prophecy. There will be characters that will help our dear Freek, others will try to deceive him, others will just want to eat it in order to break their curse. The game was created by only one person at zero budget This game is a puzzle game that tells a creepy story ATTENTION the crows eat the eyes !!!
